title: Teams can find treasure at The Crystal
text:
Teams can find treasure at The Crystal Teams can find treasure at The Crystal Details Category: Venues & Events   14:30 Businesses searching for a team building day that will test their sense of adventure are being offered a unique solution, thanks to one of London’s landmark venues. The Crystal, at Royal Victoria Docks has teamed up with Wild Goose, one of the leading providers of interactive team building days, to create a special offering which will see participants head off on an interactive treasure hunt. 
The package will see teams given a set of instructions via a tablet which will include GPS challenges and games, while giving them the opportunity to explore London and discover more about the city's history. The full day of fun activities will be concluded with a sparkling wine and canapés reception at the Crystal and a two-course buffet, after which the venue will present each member of the winning team with a prize. “Team building events are perfect for entertaining and offer a shared experience that people can talk about for years to come,” said Rhiannon Thomas, Sales Executive at the Crystal. "The ‘hunt for the Crystal’ is a really exciting activity for any company wanting to do something different and enjoy the superb hospitality at the Crystal at the same time." The treasure hunt days for team-building are priced at £140 plus VAT per person, based on a minimum number of 40. Bespoke packages are available on request. The Crystal, which is part of Siemens’ Sustainable Cities Initiative, is recognised as one of the world’s greenest buildings and houses a number of events spaces which are available for private hire throughout the year.
